definition: manner of acting or controlling yourself, to lead, as in the performance of a composition
details:
noun
- manner of acting or controlling yourself
- (behavioral attributes) the way a person behaves toward other people
verb
- to lead, as in the performance of a composition
= example: to lead, as in the performance of a composition
= synonyms: lead, direct
- to lead musicians in the performance of
= example: to lead musicians in the performance of
- to take somebody somewhere
= example: to take somebody somewhere
= synonyms: take
- to transmit or serve as the medium for transmission
= example: to transmit or serve as the medium for transmission
= synonyms: carry
- to direct the course of
= synonyms: deal
- to behave in a certain manner
= synonyms: act
